content.title: PHACE Syndrome
content.description: Posterior fossa malformations, Hemangioma, Arterial anomalies, Cardiac defects, Eye abnormalities - neurocutaneous syndrome.
content.clinical_pearl: Large facial hemangioma in beard distribution or >5cm should prompt PHACE workup including brain MRI and echo
